pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Small Sauropod $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Type:$() Solo Traveller $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Grasslands

Journal Page by $(l)HannahPBnJ$() $(br2)The Amargasaurus is a mid-sized sauropod. It can be tamed as a baby with veggies and ridden with a saddle. Adult Amargasauruses have a huge armor stat, making them great in battles against other travellers and dinosaurs alike. Amargasaurus can be switched into Offensive or Defensive mode with Space (10 second cooldown) while ridden.
